full_text:
The Packers are adding to their WR Corp.

The Packers signed former Ravens WR Sammy Watkins to a 1yr deal worth $4M. 

Watkins is apart of the Packers ongoing efforts to revamp their receiving corp after trading Davante Adams and losing Marquez Valdez-Scantling to free agency. https://t.co/m6gbSoMMuR
